archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0017
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a new or existing customer, I want to be able to purchase hardware outright in store as a guest, so that I can get new hardware quickly

properties.value: Guest customer, in store, hardware only
Does it involve Comarch especially for "guest customer"? Probably the whole process is outside of Comarch. All usecases to be checked by VF (like repair process). Also question about insurance.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
